reviews.title: Brilliant weekend away
reviews.text: Fantastic country getaway for large groups. The non-family rooms are small but have everything in you need, the comunial areas are great and the hot tub is again small but great for the few who will brave the British weather. We stayed in the Barn which was great for a group of 11 adults and a few nippers.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing we had a grumble about was the cost of dogs staying which was very steep at £40 a dog!
reviews.title: Good place

likes.liked: — Comfy bed and excellent shower facilities
